meanings.definition: Test taken again to check previous results.
meanings.sent1: She had to take multiple retests to improve her grades.
meanings.sent2: The teacher scheduled retests for students who were absent during the original exam.
meanings.sent3: The retests piled up on her desk, reminding her of the importance of studying.
meanings.sent4: The retests were like a second chance to show what she had learned.
meanings.sent5: The thought of retests made her nervous but also motivated her to study harder.

meanings.definition: To take a test again to confirm results.
meanings.sent1: He retests his knowledge before the final exam to ensure he is prepared.
meanings.sent2: She retests her hypothesis to validate the experiment's outcome.
meanings.sent3: The scientist retests the data to double-check for any errors.
meanings.sent4: Repeating the experiment retests the accuracy of the initial findings.
meanings.sent5: The athlete retests his speed to see if he has improved since last time.
